member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamSparklineView.MeasureOverride(System.Windows.Size)
member.summary: Provides the behavior for the Measure pass of Silverlight layout. Classes can override this method to define their own Measure pass behavior.
member.param: The available size that this object can give to child objects. Infinity () can be specified as a value to indicate that the object will size to whatever content is available.
member.returns: The size that this object determines it needs during layout, based on its calculations of the allocated sizes for child objects; or based on other considerations, such as a fixed container size.

member.summary: Handles property changes.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamSparkline.ExportVisualData
member.summary: Returns the sparkline visuals expressed as a SparklineVisualData object.
member.returns: A SparklineVisualData object representing the current sparkline visuals.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamSparkline.PixelScalingRatio
member.summary: Gets or sets the scaling value used to affect the pixel density of the control.
member.remarks: A higher scaling ratio will produce crisper visuals at the expense of memory. Lower values will cause the control to appear blurry.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.XamSparkline.ActualPixelScalingRatio
member.summary: Gets the actual scaling value used by the component to affect the pixel density of the control.
member.remarks: A higher scaling ratio will produce crisper visuals at the expense of memory. Lower values will cause the control to appear blurry.
